subject: Where is my order
description_text:
Hi
I ordered the Vam pro haptics on 25th Dec 2025 and paid for 3-5 days delivery. It's now the 3rd Jan and I still haven't recieved my order. Where is it?
Order number : SF6045959598187
RegardsRyan Clarke

Yahoo Mail: Search, organise, conquer

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 10197 中
